thread.title: Nightclub in Istanbul Subject to Armed Attack, Several Injured
thread.title_full: Nightclub in Istanbul Subject to Armed Attack, Several Injured

title: Nightclub in Istanbul Subject to Armed Attack, Several Injured
text:
0 916 0 1 A night nightclub Istanbul is subject to an armed attack, local media reported. 
A night nightclub in Istanbul has been attacked, local media reported. Turkish local TV channel has shown a footage of armoured police vehicles on street outside of the nightclub, many people were injured according to reports. #Turkey Footage near #İstanbul nightclub, where gunfire was reported. Turkish TV says there are injured people pic.twitter.com/D6Sesl9xfd 
​According to Turkish NTV channel, two attackers were involved in the club attack. The shooters were dressed as Santa Clauses, media report. ...
